name: ERP Platform for PROSER
description: Main purpose of this project is to create an ERP platform based in modules to help PROSER Veterinaries to manage their everyday activities.

name: Slot Machine
description: Slot machine simulator with debugging mode. This app was created using React. Try it out!

name: Blogging App
description: Blogging App created with Node.js, Express, MongoDB. This app was created to provide free blogging services.

name: Ecommerce Platform
description: Ecommerce platform created witn React and Node.js, using Braintree to handle, Paypal and CreditCard Payments.

name: POS System
description: Point of sale system created using PHP and Codeigniter, used to provide services to a veterinary company.

name: Chat One to One
description: Chat created using Socket.io to provide communication one to one to users online of a bloggin-app
